title: War Time Propaganda
content:
Hi,

I'm looking at various styles of propaganda posters as inspiration for a project. I like this one from WWII a lot, especially the type. Can someone tell me what fonts are used here?

Thanks!

Chloe

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017192112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vintage-war-propaganda-posters05_4827.jpg)
author: c.gray

comments.content:
yep.. must be hand-drawn  
and also I reckon we will have to do as the sign says and not pick up any Loose and Loaded Women  
VD is not Victory
